content: प्रज्ञा {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To know, know about, be acquainted with. {@--2@} To be a ware of, find out. {@--3@} To discern, distinguish. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (प्रज्ञपयति) {@--1@} To show, point out (as way). {@--2@} To discover. {@--3@} To call, summon, invite.

प्रज्ञा {@--1@} Intelligence, understanding, intellect, wisdom; आकारसदृशप्रज्ञः प्रज्ञया सदृशागमः <ls>R. 1. 15</ls>; शस्त्रं निहंति पुरुषस्य शरीरमेकं प्रज्ञा कुलं च विभवं च यशश्च हंति .. <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--2@} Discernment, discrimination, judgment. {@--3@} Device or design. {@--4@} A wise or learned woman. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the goddess Sarasvatī.
